chapters.title: Chapter 5: A Broken Crown
chapters.info: Annoura Larisen, p. 121 (144)—Aes Sedai of the Gray Ajah with a broad face, wide mouth, and beak of a nose. She keeps her long dark hair in braids; she grew up in Tarabon. She serves as advisor to Berelain sur Paendrag, the First of Mayene. See also sur Paendrag Paeron, Berelain.
